item.title: Why Analysts See SoFi, Affirm Benefiting From A Credit Card Rate Cap
item.description: On Friday, Trump said he is weighing a one-year 10% cap on credit card interest rates, calling current rates of 20% to 30% unreasonably high.

item.title: Paramount Skydance Takes WBD To Court Over Netflix Offer – Seeks Data So Shareholders Can Make An 'Informed Decision'
item.description: The David Ellison-led company sought information regarding Netflix’s offer for Warner Bros. Discovery.

item.title: Meta Names Dina Powell As President And Vice Chairman In Executive Shake-Up
item.description: Powell McCormick had served as Deputy National Security Advisor under President Donald J. Trump.
